data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Canóvanas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Canóvanas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Canóvanas, Puerto Rico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Canóvanas, Puerto Rico.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Canóvanas, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Canóvanas do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Campo Rico
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Campo Rico, Canóvanas, Puerto Rico.
Father, you gave the church of Canóvanas, Puerto Rico the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 44,700 citizens of the the state of Canóvanas.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 27,729 people in the state of Canóvanas who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
